'''Gaderian Bosc''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Gaderian Bosc is the leader of a sect of former [Dawnstars](/childrenOfTheDawnstars/). He had a "vision" of Eothas marching into the Deadfire and requesting an army of followers. Bosc convinced the former Dawnstars, known as [Partisans of the Lighted Path](/childrenOfTheDawnstarsPartisansOfTheLightedPath/), that Eothas needed their souls for the battle.

## =Quests

=
* [The Lighted Path](/theLightedPath/): Bosc has convinced a group of Eothasians, known as the [Partisans of the Lighted Path](/childrenOfTheDawnstarsPartisansOfTheLightedPath/), to sacrifice themselves to [Eothas](/eothas/) by drinking the venom of an Aedyran tree viper.<ref name="alchemy check">After passing an alchemy check, ''"Judging the color and consistency of the liquid Bearn consumed, you suspect it's venom from an Aedyran tree viper, and know that taru taru, when combined with ripple sponge, can mitigate its absorption and counteract some of its effects."''</ref>

## Trivia

* He is voiced by [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0759525/ William Salyers].
